mapper.select:
select ifnull(sum(total),0) from carbon_credit_assets
and date_format(issuing_date, '%Y-%m') = date_format(#{statDate}, '%Y-%m')

select ifnull(sum(total),0) from carbon_quota_assets
and date_format(issuing_date, '%Y-%m') = date_format(#{statDate}, '%Y-%m')

select ifnull(sum(estimated_reduction),0) reductionTotal, count(if(cp.project_status = '0100000013',cp.id,null)) singCount, count(if(cp.project_status = '0100000007',cp.id,null)) filingCount, count(if(cp.project_status = '0100000005',cp.id,null)) approvedCount from carbon_project cp

select cp.project_name projectName, ifnull(cp.estimated_reduction,0) reduction, cp.project_status developmentState, cca.transaction_status tradeState
from carbon_project cp left join carbon_credit_assets cca on cca.carbon_project_id = cp.id limit 10

select sum(ctc.trade_quantity * ctc.asset_unit_price) from carbon_trade_contract ctc
and date_format(delivery_time, '%Y-%m') = date_format(#{statDate}, '%Y-%m')
